response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to present this extraordinary opportunity to you. The product I have to offer is truly unique and holds immense value for me. I believe it could be equally valuable to you, depending on your needs and interests. Given its significance to me, I am proposing a price of $15,000 for this item.
